thread.section_title: Ibis Styles London Leyton - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great place at an affordable price
thread.title_full: Great place at an affordable price - Review of Ibis Styles London Leyton, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Susana R
title: Great place at an affordable price
text:
Above all the staff. It is such a comfort to find a hotel where the staff are proud of their service. they were all very friendly and glad to help.
The hotel is a basic place with all the expected services. The freakfast is the right quality and amount for the price we paid. Hot buns, fresh coffee and tea. Different types of bread and fresh fruit. What else!!!.
Note that the receptionist will help you printing out your boarding cards!!. That is a plus for them and for Ibis.
Also it is very well connect with the City centre by bus and underground
